text: Olav Tuelo Johannesen (born 23 February 1984) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a forward. He also holds citizenship of Botswana. He was born to a Motswana mother and a Norwegian father. ==Club career== Tuelo Johannesen started his career at Larvik Turn as a youth player. In 2003, he made a transfer to Sandefjord, and he made his Tippeligaen debut in the scoreless draw against Stabæk on 9 April 2006. During his period in Sandefjord, he was loaned out to Bodø/Glimt (2005–2006) and HamKam (2006–2007). In 2007 Olav made a transfer to Kongsvinger. He played 105 matches for the club.
